Class ElasticSearchUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projectattitude.projectattitude.Controllers.ElasticSearchUserController

  • public class ElasticSearchUserController
extends java.lang.Object
    ElasticSearchUserController contains tasks that communicate and update the database with users
